data.author: Joey Cappelletti, Christopher Rugaber, The Associated Press
data.title: Republican lawmakers close ranks around Powell, who spent years building ties in Congress. ‘He gets in there, pets the dog, shoots the breeze’
data.description: “He knows his way around Congress,” said Robert Tetlow, a former senior policy adviser at the Fed.
data.content: President Donald Trump has spent his second term bulldozing elected and appointed officials who resist him or refuse to bend to his demands. But he may have met his match in Federal Reserve Chair Jer… [+6743 chars]
